sentence.Network_en: Ellis bristles at accusations that Berkeley's experiment is ill-conceived.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃利斯对有人指责伯克利的实验考虑不够周密感到气愤。

sentence.Network_en: My judgement is that / In my judgement the plan is ill - conceived.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的意见是[据我看来]该计划考虑不周.

sentence.Network_en: The Tunipan plan is ill - conceived because it is antienviromental.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个图尼帕计划是考虑欠妥的,因为它破坏天然环境.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(67) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... ill-come 不受欢迎的 ill-conceived 构想拙劣的 ill-conditioned 坏脾气的.
翻译资源百分百... ... 错误行为 misdeed 错误的想法 ill-conceived 帮助高官卸责 whitewashing senior officals' responsibility.
Dream turns to nightmare... ... turned to rout 几近崩溃 ill-conceived 考虑不周的 make a gutsy bet on 大胆一搏.
学生：但你先前有说到关于界定计划和它的顺序的事，如果你真的正确地这样做了，难道你不能避免构思不良的（ill-conceived）计划 …

list.abs: The Tunipan plan is ill - conceived because it is antienviromental., 这个图尼帕计划是考虑欠妥的 , 因为它破坏天然环境.
I am here to protest an ill - conceived sordid scheme ., 我来这就是要对一项考虑欠妥 , 卑鄙龌龊的计划表示抗议.
now argue that ill - conceived government measures have stopped , or are hindering , the natural recovery mechanisms ., 目前主张 , 考虑不周的政府举措 , 已经中断或者正在妨碍自然复苏机制的运作.

an immensely impressive and imposing edifice , the international financial system , collapsed not because of some extraneous shock , but because it was ill conceived .国际金融体系令人难忘而壮丽的大厦，不是因为外部的冲击而倒塌的，而是因为错误的构想而倒塌的。
they were also conscious that the process of change should not be facile , permitting ill-conceived and hastily passed amendments .他们是还神志清楚变动的过程不应该是轻便的，允许怀有敌意和仓促地通过的校正。

entry.tran: 筹划不周的;计划欠周详的
entry.def: If you describe a plan or action as ill-conceived, you mean that it is likely to fail or have bad consequences because it has not been thought about carefully enough.

example.ex: ...an ill-conceived plan to close the coal mine.
example.tran: 一个考虑不周的关闭煤矿的计划

sentences.sentence: "an ill-conceived plan to take over the company"
